title: Lunar Revel shop , plz help me !!!
body: when i clicked lunar revel shop, there were only 5 skins displayed and i don't know where was the last one going. I asked riot for helps,but did't fix the problem yet, and i felt very unfair +_+ **Does anyone know what's wrong with this {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} **_ ??

replies.body:
Hiya! 

If you own a good chunk of skins, you may only receive five deals. I have seen this happen with one other player who didn't own a ton of skins, but he was able to get six deals once he refreshed the client. Try refreshing your client and lemme know if you're still having this issue.
